content: Just wanted to say thanks to everyone who came, and thanks to @Forest Anderson for MC'ing the panel.
for those who weren't able to come this time, I wanted to say that if you are interested in helping out with organizing future CTCFT events, get in touch! (more info here)
I've been wanting to check out ctcft, but it seems it's always in the middle of the night European time. Are there plans for organizing events at different times?
@rylev The times alternate. The next one is at https://everytimezone.com/s/b65371cd. I think that is still pretty late for you, though, but hopefully not too late?

9pm is pretty rough - I understand a lot of people in Europe will want to meet in our evening, but that's not the case for me. I appreciate how hard it is to schedule something for a global audience, so don't take this as a criticism. I'm just keen to join in on the fun!
@rylev I am open to altering the times, for sure!
I suppose we could run a kind of poll or something to get a sense of what would be the best times overall
Having just attended a 9pm meeting I can appreciate it is not ideal :)
